Reference

All functions

add_titles() add_footnotes()

Add hf_line title(s) and footnote(s) to a rtf_doc object

align() `align<-`() set_align()

Return or set text alignment

bold() `bold<-`() set_bold()

Return or set bold

column_header_buffer() `column_header_buffer<-`() set_column_header_buffer()

Return or set column_header_buffer attributes

font() `font<-`() set_font()

Return or set font

font_size() `font_size<-`() set_font_size()

Return or set font size

header_height() `header_height<-`() set_header_height() footer_height() `footer_height<-`() set_footer_height()

Return or set header/footer height

header_rows() `header_rows<-`() set_header_rows()

Return or set the header_rows

hf_line()

Create a title line container

ignore_cell_padding() `ignore_cell_padding<-`() set_ignore_cell_padding()

Return or set ignore_cell_padding

index() `index<-`() set_index()

Return or set index

italic() `italic<-`() set_italic()

Return or set italics

margins() `margins<-`() set_margins()

Return or set margins

orientation() `orientation<-`() set_orientation()

Return or set orientation

pagesize() `pagesize<-`() set_pagesize()

Return or set pagesize

pharmaRTF-package

pharmaRTF

rtf_doc()

Create a rtf_doc object

text() `text<-`() set_text()

Return or set text

titles_and_footnotes_from_df()

Read titles and footnotes from a dataframe

view_footnotes()

View footnote information

view_titles()

View title information

write_rtf()

Write RTF document
